articles.author: Vibha Sharma
articles.title: What next after the Indus Waters Treaty suspension - The Tribune
articles.description: IWT “is the most important treaty, a question of life and death, for Pakistan”, says Himanshu Thakkar of the South Asia Network on Dams, Rivers and People.
articles.content: In 2018, a study by the European Commission's Joint Research Centre (JRC) painted a rather disturbing picture of a nearby future with people fighting over access to water. According to the study, fiv… [+5027 chars]
